page.title: 16WRITTLE,TRAVELLING PEOPLE
page.content: Writtle, over the years has had a number of travelling people pass through.Because they live in caravans these people are, sometimes incorrectly called gypsies.But most of the families that stay in Writtle and the surrounding areas are fairground families.They usually arrive in the Autumn and leave in the Spring for the Summer season. They usually park their caravans at either Oxney Green or Hassenbrooks and the same families return each year. When they are staying in Writtle the children usually attend Writtle Junior School.
